1.content: Alright, the rules are set. The expansions are chosen. Let's start this bad boy. You can make your own gorgon character, or in some cases, use a gorgon character from your own stories. Just remember, they HAVE to be female and 18 or older. So let's begin.
1.title: Let the Snakey Fun Begin

choices: The Island of a Single Wish
11.content:
Alright, so you went with the tried and true Breast Expansion. Now, what story would you like?

Never Anger a Succubus - Jen is a easily pissed off, loner hybrid (of a diamondback rattler and a cobra) gorgon living in a city of monsters. One day, she gets into a fight with a succubus and ends up making fun of the succubus's large breast. Angered, the succubus puts a curse on Jen as revenge. Now Jen's breasts are getting bigger and heavier by the day. The only way to stop them is to apologize. But the succubus has vanished.

Science Happens - Laura is a king cobra gorgon who works at a laboratory. One day, while working, she accidentally spills a mixture of chemicals onto her breasts. Later that day, she discovers the chemicals are making her breasts grow. Realizing the potential, she sells the mixture to a group trying to end world hunger and becomes a millionaire. She is now living the good life, but has one problem: her breasts won't stop growing.

The Island of a Single Wish - Victoria is a black mamba gorgon on a flight to Hawaii. The plane's engines fail and it crashes into the ocean, killing everyone except Victoria. She washes up on a deserted island, alone and hungry. While trying to survive, she discovers that the island grants her one wish. She wishes for her breasts to grow and fill with milk, thinking that it will end her thirst. But there's one problem: the wish wasn't specific, and now not only will her breasts not stop growing, but she can't lactate. Now she must try to survive on the island with her ever growing bosom.

Buxom Sonata - Julia is an anaconda gorgon and a lounge singer in 1920's London. One night, after a show, her boss approaches her with bad news. The club she works at is not drawing in more patrons, and if things don't pick up soon, the club will close for good. Desperate to save the club, Julia looks for an answer. She learns of an amulet that grants the user incredible singing abilities, but at a random cost. Finding it, Julia's singing becomes incredible and the club's popularity skyrockets. But she soon learns what the cost is: every time she sings, her breasts get bigger and fill with milk that she can't lactate.

113.content:
Victoria slowly opened her eyes and looked around. She was on a beach and in front of her was a jungle. She tried to remember what had happened. The memories came flooding back.

She was on a plane to Hawaii when all of a sudden, the engines failed. The plane went into a nose dive into the ocean. Victoria was thrown from her seat and landed in the water. She saw the island and swam for it. She saw that everyone else on the plane were dead, so she was alone. She reached the island shore when she passed out.

As the memories ended, she stood up to her full 6'2'' height. Victoria was not a normal person. She was a gorgon based on the Black Mamba snake. She was covered from head to toe in shiny, silver scales, and had Black Mamba snakes for hair along with black eyes. The inside of her mouth was inky black (which is how the Black Mamba gets it's name) and she had sharp front fangs. She had an hourglass figure, but she was bigger up top. She was wearing a blue tee-shirt that was ripped and black shorts.

As she looked around the island, which she guessed was fairly big, she realized something: she was both thirsty and starving. The swim from the plane wreck to the island drained her. She would have to try and find food soon.

Before she could start, however, something weird happened. The sand in front of her started shifting. As she watched it, she realized it was making words. When it was done, it read:

'Welcome to the Island of a Single Wish. Here, you may make one wish and one wish only. You may not take back your wish.'

Victoria was surprised. Wishes shouldn't be real. Then again, she was a gorgon, so she believed anything. She could wish for anything. But as she thought, her thirst got to her. She looked down at her breasts, then had an idea. She said her wish.

"I wish my breasts would grow and fill with milk."

When the wish left her mouth, she had a realization: she could have used her wish to get off the island. As she cursed herself for being stupid, a warmth came over her. Her wish was being granted. Suddenly, she felt her breasts begin to grow. She could also feel them filling up. Eventually, they reached the size of...
113.title: The Island of a Single Wish

choices: Before she could decide, her breasts started growing again
1133.content:
Her growth finally stopping, Victoria had a chance to see how big she had gotten. And she had gotten HUGE. Her shirt had completely ripped apart from the growth. Each breast was the size of a bean bag chair. And they were extremly heavy. She could feel the milk sloshing around inside them. While she felt stupid for wasting her wish, she was a little happy. At least now, she had something to drink. So she sat down to begin lactating so she could drink.

45 minutes later, nothing had happened.

Victoria was confused. She had done everything she could think of to lactate, but nothing worked. The milk just refused to come out. She sat there thinking. Why wasn't this working? Then she realized: when she had wished to fill with milk, she forgot to specifiy that she wanted to lactate it. She smacked her palm to her forehead. She now had massive breasts filled to the brim with milk, but she couldn't lactate them. And she couldn't take back her wish, so she was stuck with them.

As she cursed herself, she saw something out of the corner of her eye. There was a small spring to her left, and it was filled with clear water. Finally, something to drink. Slowly, she got up. It was much more difficult with her heavy breasts. She made her way over to the spring. Kneeling down, she scooped up a handful and drank. The water was heavenly. She drank from the spring until her thirst was finally quenched.

With difficulty, Victoria stood back up again. With her thirst dealt with, she now had two tasks ahead of her: find food so she doesn't starve to death, and build a shelter that will fit her. But what to do first?
1133.title: Wish Gone Wrong

choices: Supplies from the plane floated to shore
11332.content:
Victoria decided that her first order of business was to build herself a shelter. It was starting to get dark and cold, so that would be her first priority.

First, she had to find somewhere to put the shelter Looking around, Victoria spotted a small area near a giant tree. She chose that for her main shelter location. It offered protection from potential rain.

Now, she had to find branches for the foundation. She didn't have an ax, so she had to find branches on the ground. Searching wasn't easy. It got harder to see, and her now massive breasts made it hard to move and bend over. But she did manage to locate several large branches. She brought them back and set them up so that they made a crude framework for her shelter.

Now she needed something to act as covering. Looking to the sea, she could see that some supplies were floating to the island, but they were still a ways away. So she had to make due with what she had. She managed to locate some loose bushes and was able to use those.

Finally, she was done. Looking over her crude shelter, she was satisfied. Climbing in, she lied down on her now massive breasts for support (at least they were good for something) and, using a leafy branch, went to sleep.

The next morning, she woke up with a backache from her uncomfortable sleep. As she rubbed her eyes, she was surprised by what she saw. Overnight...

115.title: Other

1151.content:
It was an average day in Screamtown. Screamtown was a town that was inhabited by monsters of mythology that were as big as skyscrapers. However, unlike other parts of the monster world, the monsters of Screamtown lived in peace with humans that would've been eaten anywhere else. Curiously Screamtown was split into five parts. Besides the center of town, there were four corners that were locked in only one season regardless of the time of year. Our story takes place at a bakery in Springtime Street.

The proprietress was Maddie Thurman, a 915ft tall long gorgon girl. Maddie was a chubby gorgon with purplish skin and lavender colored rattlesnakes for hair. Unlike most gorgons, she had a 1000ft long rattlesnake's tail where her legs would normally be, making her look more like a naga than a gorgon. Because she was a gorgon, Maddie had to wear a special pair of gorgon proof sunglasses or she'd turn anyone who looked into her eyes to stone. Madeline was at the time working with some bread dough as her human assistant Rick was gathering blueberries to put into the mix. It was a rather slow day and Maddie's pet gargoyle beast was asleep right near the door.

However, the beast quickly woke up as somebody entered the shop. It was Latanya Bull, an 1110ft tall and obese green furred minotaur. Latanya had a hunched over back and brown hair that was going gray prematurely. While she wore a black shirt and purple jacket, her massive udder made it impossible for Latanya to wear pants.

"Hi Maddie," said Latanya. "What's up?" "Oh," said Maddie as she looked up at the ceiling. "There's three light bulbs, some wallpaper..." "Maddie," said Rick. "She means how are you doing." Maddie was sweet but she wasn't exactly the smartest monster. "Oh," says Maddie. "Well, things could be better. Haven't had much business today. I highly doubt dieting has anything to do it. This is Scream Town. The monster girls are either amazons or the size of sumo wrestlers." "I see," said Latanya. "Listen, Maddie. I found something growing in my garden that I thought you'd be interested in."

Latanya reached into her jacket pocket and took out a weird piece of fruit that looked like two orbs stuck together. It was bright pink in color and had strange swirl marking on it and white patches. "That's a fruit?" asked Rick. "It looks like a pair of boobs." Latanya adjusted her glasses to take a closer look as Latanya instinctively closed her eyes. "It's okay, Latanya, I'm not taking my sunglasses off. That is a nice fruit. What is it?" "Hell if I know," said Latanya. "Freya's the one in the family who specializes in fruit. I grilled that sister of mine and she said she never saw a fruit like this before."

"Hmm," said Maddie. "I wonder how it would taste in a pie. How much do you want for it, Latanya?" Latanya shrugged her shoulder. "I don't know? Twenty skulls?" Maddie opened her cash register to take out a 20 skull bill and handed it to Latanya in exchange for the fruit. However, the moment Latanya handed Maddie the fruit, Maddie's gargoyle beast stared at the fruit and growled. "What's wrong, Caliban?" asked Rick. The gargoyle beast barked loudly and hissed at the fruit. "You might want to take him to the vet, Maddie," says Latanya. "Crazy gargoyle dog. Barking at fruit. See you later, Madeline."

Maddie however just looked at the fruit with a smile and took out a knife. "I wonder how this would taste in a pie." Maddie took a slice as big as Rick was and Rick saw a strange white juice come out of the fruit. "Are you sure you should eat that, Maddie?" asked Rick. "It could be poison." "Rick," said Maddie. "I'm a gorgon with venomous snakes for hair. Poison can't hurt me. And besides, I'd be the first to know if it was poison." Maddie bit into the slice of fruit and ate it while Rick watched for the verdict and Caliban looked on and growled slightly.

"It tastes a little too sweet," said Maddie. "But otherwise it's not bad." Maddie then cut away at the fruit to extract a few seeds. "I think I'll try to grow it myself so I don't have to keep bothering Latanya." "I don't know, Boss," said Rick as he stood on Maddie's thumbnail. "I don't think Caliban likes you eating that fruit." Maddie but the fruit into five pie pans before mashing it up and pouring the batter on for the crust. "I'm not eating all of it, Rick. I'm going to sell it."

Rick knew that arguing with his skyscraper sized boss would get him nowhere, so he shrugged his shoulders as Caliban let out a whimper. "I think you're trying to tell your master something," said Rick. "Aren't you, Boy." The giant dog-like creature let out a moan and nodded his head.

Maddie had exactly five customers that day and each one bought one of the five pies. The first was the mail carrier, Estelle de Quimper. Estelle was a 975ft lou carcolh, a hybrid monster of a dragon and a mollusk. She had the head of a dragon but the body of a giant violet snail with arms and legs and a spiked shell on her back. "Thanks, Maddie," said Estelle. "You don't know what a pain it is to have to be the one who chips in for pie and cake for everyone at the post office. Can't they bring their own damn sweets. What kind of pie is this anyway?" Maddie shrugged her shoulders. "Heck if I know." She said.

Maddie's second customer of the day was Cassidy Voltaire, a 925ft tall vulture harpy with pewter gray feathers and grayish brown hair. She wore nothing but a pair of leg warmers because she ran the Screamtown gym with her daughter, Libby, a pigeon harpy. "I never thought I'd see you buying a pie, Cassidy." Said Rick. Cassidy shrugged her shoulders. "Maddie's been having such a slow day, I thought I'd pet the dog." Maddie smiled at that. "There he is." She said pointing at Caliban, obviously taking Cassidy's words literally.

The third customer was Rangiku Urameshi, a 985ft tall and pear shaped red hellhound woman with hair reaching down to her rear, spikes running down her back and a skull like face. Rick was a friend of Rangiku's daughter, Manami and knew for a fact that the Urameshi's were a mixed family of humans and hellhounds. "Thanks, Maddie," said Rangiku. "This pie smells otherworldly." Maddie smiled and nodded her head. Perhaps that strange ingredient would improve her business.

Maddie's fourth customer was Angel Bauza, a 1050ft tall apple-shaped and gold furred weretigress inventor who lived in Autumn Avenue. "I'll try anything once," said Angel. "I came here because I heard from Freya about this strange fruit that Latanya sold you. I just hope it tastes good." Maddie nodded her head.

Maddie's last customer was Pauline Pride, a 1000ft black furred Nemean lioness who ran a restaurant in Winter Way. She held up and sniffed the strange pie. "I'll be the judge of this pie," said Pauline. "I might put it on the menu if it's good enough." "That's nice." Said Maddie.

After Pauline bought the last pie, it was closing time and Maddie had locked up the bakery to go home. "See you tomorrow, Rick." Said Maddie. Rick waved goodbye as he walked up to the human sized terminal to wait for a monster taxi to pick him up. As Maddie was slithering home, Caliban followed her and had a slight scowl on his canine face. He did not trust that weird fruit that his master had bought.

That night, Maddie was getting in bed with Othello, her gargoyle husband. Othello was a muscular blue skinned gargoyle one head taller than his wife with a long beak and white hair. He was already fast asleep as Maddie yawned and slithered into her bed, putting her glasses on the table. She didn't have to worry about petrifying Othello or Caliban since both gargoyles and gargoyle beasts were immune to gorgon eyes.

The next morning, Maddie was the first to wake up and let out a yawn, albeit she took more effort than normal to get up. "Geez," she said. "I know I'm on the heavy side, but I couldn't have put on weight over night could I?" Maddie turned on her lamp and then she looked down and had to put on her glasses (they weren't just to protect people from her stony gaze. She really needed them to see). Once Maddie could see what was in front of her, she let out a scream that woke up both Caliban and Othello.

"Maddie!" yelled Othello. "What's wrong!?" "Othello," said Maddie to her gargoyle husband. "You're not going to believe this." Othello looked in surprise because Maddie's breasts were the size of...
1151.title: Milkyberry Surprise

Othello was referring to Gabriella Gallops, the local sorceress. Gabriella was a 1500ft tall and big-bellied silver furred unicorn with long blonde hair, a pink horn and pink feathered wings. It was rumored that the strange weather in Screamtown with the four sections of the town locked in different perpetual seasons was due to a spell that the unicorn giantess cast a long time ago. My name is Connie Bell. I am a 23 year old Australian Copperhead gorgon. I have purple scales, orange eyes, and snakes for hair. I am fairly muscular, but my breasts... I'll get to that in a minute.

In case you were born into this world and do not know or care about history, allow me to explain: in 2114, a strange plague hit our planet, which was populated by many monsters. Only female gorgons over 18 survived: other species, and all men and people under 18 did not. The female gorgons over 18 lived because the plague affected them in a... strange way. It made their breasts grow to insane sizes, and filled them to the absolute brim with milk that can never be lactated. And they never stop growing. Some gorgons became bandits, roaming the wastelands looking for people to kill and resources to steal. Others make their own kingdoms to rule. Most are like me, scavangers just looking to live.

There is still a population over a million, but as I said, it's all female adult gorgons. And even then, it's hard to find anyone. The population is spread so thin.

I've been stuck in bed for the past 3 weeks. I can't stop coughing, and I've lost all feeling in my letft arm and right leg. The doctors don't know whats wrong. It's truly awful here.

The only people who have consistant symptoms are female, adult gorgons. All of them are getting giant breasts, and they're filling with milk. But from what I've heard, doctors can't getting the milk out. And the weirdest thing is, apart from that, they're healthy. Lucky! Guess you lucked out huh, being a gorgon too.

Well, the doctors are coming to check on me again. Maybe they have some good news. Though I doubt it.

Your Loving Husband,

Eric

There were many gorgons in ancient Greece and none were more infamous than Medusa. Except for maybe one gorgon in particular. Her name was Kara and she was a pale albino white skinned gorgon with rattlesnakes for hair, sharp fingernails and toenails and a long rattlesnake's tail. She was an evil bitch of a gorgon if there ever was one. She was a horrible monster who would petrify anyone unfortunate enough to come across her, especially when unprovoked.

At this moment she had petrified a few children playing by the stream as she let out an evil laugh, going so far as to push one of her stoned victims into the ground with her foot. "It feels so good to be so bad." Hissed the rattlesnake woman as she made her petrifying eyes glow. She then let out another vicious laugh before she petrified a nearby stag and even broke off one of its legs to scratch her back. She was pure evil.

In fact, Kara was so evil that a few other gorgons watching could only look in disgust. A long necked and purple skinned python type gorgon clenched her fists just watching the scene. "That Kara just makes my blood boil." She said. A green skinned and four-eyed cobra based gorgon with a flap around her head let out a hiss of agreement. "That bitch. Kara knows that children are off limits to gorgons." "Don't you dare say that horrible woman's name!" shouted an elderly gorgon woman with bushmasters for hair as she banged her cane into the ground. "That evil fiend is why humans hate gorgons. She's worse than Medusa, Stheno and Euryale ever were. One of these days the gods are going to get sick of her."

Kara had then tore a branch off of a tree sacred to Demeter and used it to pick her teeth when she saw was looked like a group of humans gathering for worship at a temple with a statue of Athena in front of it. "Oh goodie," said Kara with a hiss as she shook her rattle tail. "More humans to petrify."

Kara slithered forward and made sure that she was completely hidden. One archer at the temple turned his head and went to investigate. He saw Kara's tail and instinctively reached for his bow. "What matter of creature is this?" It wouldn't be a surprise that ancient Greeks wouldn't have heard of rattlesnakes let alone recognize a rattlesnake gorgon. As the archer walked closer to bushes, Kara sprung out and let out an evil hiss. Before the archer could even scream, she smashed her butt into him to knock the petrified archer to the ground. She looked down and gave a smirk because she saw the symbol for Artemis on his belt. She then scratched the crest off with her claws before laughing.

Kara hissed and walked into the temple and immediately everyone panicked. "Gorgon!" Several worshippers in the back row were instantly petrified as the rest tried to run, only for Kara to trip them with her tail and force them to look up into her eyes, turning them to stone." Kara then turned her attention to the priests. "Merciful Athena," said the head priest. "Goddess of wisdom. We besiege you; strike down this gorgon, this vile creature from Tartarus itself." The other priests fell to stone on the ground as Kara made her way to the head priest. The priest tried to turn his head but Kara spat poison into his face that burned him.

The priest screamed and held his head and in his haste he looked at Kara and instantly he was turned into a stone statue. Kara let out a laugh, proud of what she had done. However, her actions had pissed off the gods one too many times and they were watching from Mt. Olympus. "Even for a gorgon," said Athena, the goddess of wisdom. "Kara is one of the most vile creatures I've ever seen and she has just ransacked my temple." "Not to mention killed one of my favorite hunters," said Artemis, the goddess of the moon. "She has the manners of an Erymanthian boar." Aphrodite, the goddess of beauty walked forward with a smirk. "Not to mention her vanity, which gives me a good idea. I've just thought of how we can punish that gorgon."

Aphrodite whispered into Artemis and Athena's ears and all three goddesses smiled before casting the spell. Where was Kara when this was going on?

1253322222221.content:
In a small Louisiana town, one of the most popular places to be was Sy's Gym. There were many reasons as to why, but the main one was it's owner and founder, Sylvia "Sy" Kens.

Sylvia, or Sy as she preferred, was a 6 foot, 4 inch, 24-year-old Costal Taipon gorgon. She had brown scales, green eyes hidden behind sunglasses (to keep from petrifying people), and Coastal Taipons for hair. Sy was known for her muscular figure. Her arms and legs were as thick as trees, she had noticable abs, and even her back was ripped. She still had a fair bust, and a toned rear.

Despite her imposing figure, Sy was surprisingly approachable. She was one of the most social people in town. You could often find her chatting with friends, or just making new ones. She was always plesent when helping people at her gym, and was never seen without a smile. This made her very popular with both men and women.

But Sy's days were about to get quite odd, thanks to a rare illness.
-------------------------
Sy rubbed her eyes as she woke up. She never really was a morning person, which is why she only opened her gym at noon. But she had some errands to run today, so she had to get up earlier then usual.

Slowly, she got out of her bed. When she stood up, she briefly staggered. It felt like her center of gravity was off, but she brushed it off as morning lethargy. Yawning, she slowly made her way to her bathroom to shower. When she got in and caught sight of herself in the mirror, she instantly woke up from shock.

Somehow, overnight, her lower half had blown up to massive proportions. Her butt was the size of twin beach balls each, but felt heavier. Her hips were almost as wide as the bathroom door. And her thighs were still thick, but her leg muscles were replaced with what she thought was fat.

Despite her initial shock, Sy did her best to keep calm. As quickly as she could now, she walked out of the bathroom and went to her phone to call a doctor.
---------------------------
About 40 minutes later, Sy was being examined by her personal doctor, a human named Connie Hersondo. After a few minutes of poking and prodding (which caused quite a bit of moaning from Sy), Connie was done.

"Well, Sy, from the looks of it, you have Glutos Syndrome." Connie said.

"What Syndrome?" Sy asked, confused.

"Glutos. It's a extremely rare disease that only affects adult women. It causes there butts to grow extremely large and heavy. Other symptoms are increased fatigue, increased sensitivity in the butt, and sometimes rashes." Connie explained. "It's so rare that we don't actually know what causes it. I suggest that you remain in bed until we figure this out."

"No way." Sy said. "I have a lot of errands to run today, and I am not letting the gym stay closed." With that, Sy started to walk out of her room, but Connie stoped her.

"Before you do anything, you need to know two things about Glutos Syndrome. One, it's progressive. Your butt is going to continue growing." Connie said.

"Darn. What's the other thing?" Sy asked.

"The other thing," Connie said, frowing. "Is that Glutos Syndrome is..."

12533222222221.content:

Most monsters in this city were dangerous to the tiny humans which for the most part, they preyed upon, but there was a good number of the population that was friendly with humans. Our story begins in April, 2 months from Summer where 7 monsters giantesses were meeting at Triassic Wings, a hot-wing themed restaurant that served fried pterodactyl. 6 of them had gathered at a round table and were waiting for the 7th.

First was Dolly Fleece, a chubby 655ft-tall golden-wooled weresheep with curved silver horns. Next to Dolly was Nathalie “Nat” Hawthorne, an apple-figured, pitch-white-wooden-skinned jack o’lantern girl with a shiny white pumpkin for a head and long blonde hair. To the side of Nat, was Venus Leelander, a 765ft tall and overweight purple manticore with pink hair, leathery wings and four horns on her forehead. After Venus, trying to light herself a cigarette was Heloise Baskerville, an 800ft tall hellhound resembling a black doberman with long bright red hair, a devil’s tail and horns where her ears should’ve been. Then there was Martha Tortue, a 735ft tarasque, a monster that resembled a reddish brown-furred lioness with 6 arms and a tortoise’s shell. Finally was Elisa Starking, a 950ft tall Bahamut, a monster resembling a hybrid of a fish, a hippopotamus and a dragon. She had brown skin and long dark blue brunette hair.

In seconds, Skyla arrived. She was a 735ft tall heavyset kappa resembling a yellow green hawksbill sea turtle with long green hair. I invited you here because there’s a problem. I overheard Kaylee say that she’s hiring a new counselor.”

The 7 girls were camp counselors at Camp Darkly, a summer camp for young monster girls. However, they were off the job because it was still 2 months from Summer and they were working different jobs. Nat let out a squee and clapped her hands. “Yayzies!” yelled the pumpkin head. “Are we giving her a welcome party! I wish I knew sooner.” “No, you idiot,” said Heloise. “We’re making sure she isn’t competition.” Venus’s jaw dropped and she dropped her carrot into her cleavage. “Oh my gosh. You’re not saying this new counselor will muscle in on Edgar.” Elisa gave a snort and blew fire from her nostrils to eat up one of her shrimp. “We don’t know for sure, Venus. But we can’t take any chances."

Edgar was the sole male counselor and the only human. He lived in the woods with her mother, Nadine, a Nidhogg sorceress resembling a cross between a dragon and a t-rex. Nadine had cast a spell on Edgar to make him immortal so he could survive being smashed and eaten by the monster girls he interacted on a regular basis. "Well," said Martha with a growl. "If she turns out to be another Janet, I'll clobber make sure her face is more homely looking than a nuckelavee's. What does she look like, Dolly?" Dolly ate a boneless wing and licked her fingers before speaking again. "Her name is Casey Cantus. All I know is that she’s a gorgon.” Martha gave an angry roar. “Not another earth-element monster! No thanks.” “Don’t worry, Martha,” said Skyla as she wolfed down her fries in one gulp. “She won’t get the best of us.” Nat then clapped his fingers. “Yayzies! There she is! Welcome, friend!”

Casey walked forward and revealed herself to be a bright fuchsia-skinned gorgon with a head of Indian cobras and a red bindi on her forehead. She was 560ft tall and rather scrawny. Suddenly, the other girls didn’t seem so worried about her and Elisa held out a chair for her. "Come in, Casey was it? Welcome to the Camp Darkly work staff." Casey gave a nervous smile but sat down. "Thanks," she said. "You all seem friendly, uh... except for..." Casey pointed to Heloise who was smoking and Heloise glared. At least I didn't get my eatery shut down due to bad food." "Low blow, hellhound." Casey gave a laugh. "Are these all the camp counselors that will be my new coworkers." "Actually," said Elisa. "Odile and Bettina are out of town and Miranda's tending to her sick mother."

Casey let out a sigh. "Too bad. I was hoping to see that cutie, Edgar again." "What?!" yelled the other girls. Casey's snake hair sighed in joy as the gorgon showed lovestruck eyes under her sunglasses. "Edgar was the one who welcomed me to Horrorville when I moved here from Dreadberry and he got his sister to help me settle in. First human I've seen to be sisters with a wyvern. He's definitely a prize. And the best part. He's single. He told me he'd even introduce me to his mother later in the week. I heard she was a sorceress."

Needless to say, the rest of the girls were not happy that Casey already met Edgar and had already fallen in love with him. That night, as she laid in bed, Casey couldn't think of anything thing else except for Edgar and Janet. "How am I supposed to compete with a booty that big?" asked Casey to herself. Sora was a gray-skinned and pear-shaped wyvern with long white hair, jagged teeth and an arrow-shaped tail. Sora was asleep when Casey called and woke up groggily. “Hello?” “Sora,” said Casey. “Your mom wouldn’t happen to have a potion that could make my butt grow bigger than Janet's?" Sora raised an eyebrow before she realized what was going on. "Oh. Sure. This will be fun."

Heeding Casey's word, Sora snuck down into her mother's workshop where the Nidhogg was snoring away and took an ottoman-sized bottle filled with a glowing blue elixir before flying to meet with Casey. Once the wyvern arrived, she held up the bottle. "Casey," said Sora. "I only know what Mom told me about this elixir. It tastes awful but you have to drink the entire bottle for it to work.
