This story follows Medusa's life after the contest.
1253322222222222.title: Nuh-uh!

13.content:
Okay, here are 4 belly expansion stories since that part of the story seems to have been ignored up until this point

Sumo Mom - Eshter is an 800ft tall ringhals gorgon giantess who lives in Scream Town (see Monster Cove) with her human husband and stepchildren. However, the lack of conflict and peaceful atmosphere combined with her staying at home at the time has left this gorgon giantess very bored when she finds a flier for an all female monster sumo tournament in the next town over with gives her an idea for a cure for a terminal case of boredom. However, first she needs the right belly for the job.

Ruby Doom - Sabrina Vile is a 786ft tall saw-scaled viper gorgon jewel thief that operates under the crime-ridden giant monster city of Panicburg. She is the leader of a gang of monster thieves that have been causing trouble while the all gargoyle police force has been concerned with more serious criminals. One day Sabrina steals the famous Legion Eye Ruby but is nearly caught in the act and forced to swallow the ruby in order to avoid incarceration. However, the ruby has a curse that if it gets damped, it will shed into new rubies over time.

Gum Gum Gorgon- Gwen is a Titanoboa gorgon in college who due to mistaking a new elastic solution for bubblegum and subsequently swallowing it, transforms into an elastic gorgon with the power to stretch and expand her stomach at will. And wouldn't you know it, it's that day that monster criminals are causing trouble all around.

Dirty Little Liar- Cassidy is a cascabel gorgon and a reporter who has been spreading libel and lies in her paper as well as secretly cheating on her cockatrice husband with another man. Of course, her lying catches up to her because a brutish werebat who hates liars and his three friends decide to teach her a painful lesson by placing a cruel curse on her that causes her stomach to expand whenever she lies.

Or do what you do...
13.title: Belly Expansion

131.content:
Our story begins in Screamtown, a town in a world populated by giant monsters of all forms of mythology. Anywhere else, humans would be in danger of being devoured by giant monsters but in Screamtown, monsters and humans coexisted peacefully and it was illegal for monsters to harm humans. A lot of times in Screamtown there are families that mix together monsters and humans. There was one such case in the form of Esther Ringer and her family. Esther was an 800ft tall gorgon woman with cobra-like snakes called ringhals for hair, bright green skin and a long tail as well as a pair of legs. She was slightly chubby and pear-shaped which was actually common because adult female monsters in Screamtown were either very muscular like Mayor Phyllis Gacks, Dr. Desdemona Weisman and Chief Eileen Dinkley or rather heavyset and often even obese like several of Esther’s neighbors.

Esther herself lived with her human husband, Perseus in a section of Screamtown called Autumn Avenue. It was so-called because it was perpetually autumn. Before Perseus married Esther he had three human children from a previous relationship that ended badly. However, Esther got along very well with her human stepchildren and at that moment was walking them to school. The gorgon giantess was carrying them in her purse as she walked down the street. As she did so, she saw several instances that reminded her of monsters and humans getting along in Screamtown but for some reason it made her feel a sense of ennui. However, her children were as restless as ever. Her infant son, Preston was laughing as her older two children, Ashlyn and Sherman were running about because apparently Sherman took one of Ashlyn’s textbooks. “Come on, Sherman! This isn’t funny! Give it back!” “Why not? You’re not failing any classes.” “Kids,” said Esther. “Calm down. You’re going to upset Preston. Here we are, almost there.” Esther walked up to a junior high school and then handed them to the gargoyle teacher before she lowered two of her hair snakes to kiss them. “Come on, Preston,” said Esther. “We’ll come back for your brother and sister after school.”

After dropping off her older kids, Esther decided to take Preston in the harness in her necklace and go for a walk around Screamtown. First, she decided to walk by Winter Way, having pulled the hood on her sweatshirt over her head to prevent brain freeze from her cold-blooded hair. She turned to see V. V. Burton the fortune teller yeti was busy with human clients as the sorceress unicorn Gabriella Gallops flew overhead. Esther waved up at the giant unicorn woman right before she spotted Penumbra Howler the werewolf interior designer shoveling snow. Esther then turned to see what looked like a monster-sized birdbath where a human hockey game was going on and several monsters were spectators. A muscular and blonde-haired zombie giantess with an exposed spine and missing lips appeared to be cheering on her still-living human son on the ice, prompting Esther to smile. Esther noticed that Preston was feeling cold so she took her tiny son and moved on to the next part of town.

This was the part of Screamtown that was known as Springtime Street. This part of the town was stuck in spring and it showed with blades of grass as big as trees to humans and large flowers everywhere. The minotaur, Latanya Bull was working in her garden and as Esther walked down the street and turned her head, she could see Cassidy Voltaire, the vulture harpy and her pigeon-like daughter Libby jogging down the street. The Golden Hind woman, Hera Hind, was running the opposite way acting as a taxi for the humans that were riding in her belly bag. Esther looked and saw a fat and pregnant centicore woman resembling a humanoid eland. Her human husband was standing on and rubbing her pregnant belly right before she held her head down to kiss him.

“Oh,” said Esther. “Preston. How about we see if we can pick up something yummy from Maddie’s place.” Esther walked into the bakery of Springtime Street. The proprietress, Maddie, was a gorgon as well with lavender rattlesnakes for hair. Unlike Esther who had legs, Maddie only had a rattlesnake’s tail where her legs should’ve been. Some gorgons were born with legs and some were born with tails. Some gorgons like Esther had both. Maddie was busy with a mixing bowl when she noticed Esther come in. “Oh,” said Maddie. “Hi there, Eshter. Hi, Preston.” Preston burbled as Maddie moved her finger in front of him. “Hi, Maddie,” said Esther. “Would you happen to have any elephant ears?” Maddie gave a puzzled look as she felt the sides of her head. “No. I don’t have elephant ears. I have gorgon ears. But Josephine has elephant ears, which makes sense since she’s a grootslang and...” Esther rolled her eyes. “Let me rephrase that, do you have any elephant ears for sale today. And I mean pastries.” Maddie snapped her fingers. “Oh! Silly me, I just baked a batch this morning.

Esther let out a sigh. Maddie wasn’t very bright or good with metaphors. You had to be very careful when speaking to you or she wouldn’t understand a word you say. Esther then looked around and Preston’s sight was following his giant gorgon mother’s field of vision. “Where’s Rick?” asked Esther. “Rick’s home sick today,” said Maddie as she was rooting around for elephant ears. “So I gave him the day off.” Rick was the human who was Maddie’s sole employee. He lived in a tree in Mayor Gacks’s yard in Centerville. Like Esther, Rick had a mixed family. Rick’s adoptive older sister was a hippogriff named Olga. Esther smiled thinking about that but then let out a sigh. Preston looked up and saw his mother speaking with Maddie. “Maddie? Don’t you ever think that perhaps things work too well in Screamtown?”

Maddie as usual was confused. “Well, I work pretty well. I spend half the day baking sweets and then Angel, she works very well building those steampunk gadgets, Mayor Gacks works well making sure the humans and monsters get along, but then again there are monsters like Alex who work too well playing pranks, Mabel doesn’t work at all and just sleeps all day and as for Noreen, I don’t know if she has a job but she has money and electricity and water and...” Esther let out a groan. “I mean, there’s just no excitement. It’s too peaceful. Nothing ever happens.” Maddie let out a laugh. “That’s not true. Right now something is happening. Right now, I’m selling you an elephant ear.”

Esther paid for her pastry and left. She let out a groan. “Pay close attention, Preston,” said the enormous gorgon mom. “That’s what happens when one’s hair is smarter than one’s head.” Preston let out a laugh. It wasn’t long before Esther and her baby were both sharing the same elephant ear as they were sitting on a bench. “Sure,” said Esther. “It’s peaceful in Screamtown but it sure is boring.” As Esther let out another sigh, she heard a banging sound and Preston begun to cry, forcing Esther to rock him. She lifted her head to see a gashadokuro putting up a poster. The gorgon’s snake hair hissed to get a good look and Esther read the flier.

“Sumo Competition in Yellfleet. Monster Women Only. Grand Prize: 10,000 Skulls.” Esther was deep in thought on the manner right before Preston looked up and burbled at her in confusion. That was when the giant gorgon housewife got an idea to herself. But then she realized something and felt around her belly to remember that it was too small for her to enter the competition. She then smiled at Preston. “Come on, Darling,” she said. “We’re picking up takeout for lunch and I know a great restaurant...”
131.title: Screamtown Sumo

choices: During Her Date Later in the Evening
134.content:
"Oh.. oh.. oh..." Cassidy Bell was stumbling out of bed. The cascabel gorgon had just gotten through being ravaged by a hunk of a vampire. The problem was, that vampire was not her husband. Cassidy was married to Foggy Bell, a cockatrice businessman who was at the moment out of town. Cassidy had been having an affair under the cockatrice's beak for some time. Cassidy stood up and let out a sigh. "Okay," she said. "Get out." "Huh?" asked the vampire man still in a daze. Cassidy let out a sigh. "You heard me. Get out. I gotta get to work. But don't worry, Foggy won't be back until next week. Same time again tomorrow. Do what you gotta do in the bathroom and then split." With that, Cassidy was off and the vampire was struggling to put his clothes on.

Cassidy took the taxi to work. She was a reporter for the Daily Oboe and was meeting with her boss first thing. As she made her way to the editor's office, she was thinking to herself. "I really hope that Asner doesn't put me on something boring again. That story about the eight-legged horse race took a lot of thought." Cassidy walked into the office of Mr. Asner and the wolf man gave her her next assignment. "I still can't believe that Red Fountain was on steroids. It's a good thing I didn't bet on him." Cassidy gave a scoff. "Well, Chief. How else would you expect a horse that old to have 10 straight wins in a row. I heard he and his jockey have been banned from the races."

Cassidy's story was a load of horse manure. She was simply sent to cover the horse races and report who won but she used photo manipulation in order to forge a story that one of the horses was under the effect of a performance enhancing drug. What Mr. Asner didn't know was that the last 20 or so stories Cassidy gave him for the paper were nothing short of fiction. Not only was Cassidy cheating in marriage but she was cheating on the job. Asner unaware of the defeat lit a cigar before speaking to Cassidy. "Well. Here's your assignment for today. You are to inspect the new restaurant that opened downtown. It's called Burger Ghoul." Cassidy let out a scoff. "What am I? A food critic?" "Simian called in sick. I'm going to need you to fill in for him." Cassidy let out a sigh and nodded her head. "Great," she thought to herself. "I think I know exactly how to go about this one.”

Cassidy arrived at Burger Ghoul and inspected the restaurant from top to bottom. “Damn,” she thought. “Everything appears to be in order. How dreadfully boring.” Cassidy then spotted the manager sweeping the floor. He was a bright black-skinned cyclops with sharp teeth and a bald head. “Hmm,” said Cassidy. “He looks intimidating. I could easily write him as an organ thief. Oh, that sounds perfect.” Cassidy bit into a burger and smirked. “Tastes safe enough. I’ll have to think of something nasty for them to hypothetically put into the burger recipe. I could write the lettuce off as poison ivy.” Cassidy was writing down notes as she left the restaurant. “Ugh,” she said. “I can’t stand burgers. Luckily my favorite inn is nearby. I can put the finishing touches on the story there. Maybe I’ll even get the place shut down. Wouldn’t that be exciting?”

However, karma was about to deal Cassidy a very hard blow. In the front of the inn there was a group of four muscular monster men racking up a number of plates at a table. First there was a bright red-skinned Japanese oni with scars on his face and bright blue hair. He was eating so fast that he was biting right through the plates. Next to him was a onryo with long black hair, purplish skin and a green snow hat. In contrast to his friend, he was sucking up soup rather slowly. Next to the onryo was a yeti with long pink fur that had green, blue and white highlights and long eyelashes. He was the only one of the four who was eating with silverware. Lastly there was a muscular bright black furred werebat with short pinkish hair hair, large fangs and scars all over his body. From the looks of it, his lips had been completely torn off. The bat man was eating just as ferociously as his ogre friend right before pounding on the table.

“Hey waiter! What’s taking so long to get the grub going?!” The yeti let out a scoff. “You are so uncouth, Kenji. Show some class.” “At least I know how to enjoy good food, Mitsuo,” said the bat man to the yeti. “You’re only eating spotted salmon.” “If you must know,” said Mitsuo. “This spotted salmon whitens the skin.” “And other than that,” said the oni. “It has no nutritional value or taste. You might as well be eating styrofoam.” “Who asked you, Ryotaro?!” The onryo just let out a laugh at his friends right as Kenji picked up a large sausage and squirted ketchup all over it before topping it off with bread. But before the bat could take a bite, his ears twitched because he overheard Cassidy speaking on the phone. “Everything is fine, Foggy,” said the gorgon to her husband on the phone. “I just stopped at a cafe for some coffee. I just got a big story that is going to make my career.” Cassidy hung up and Kenji twitched his ears as he overheard what she was saying. "Burger Ghoul looked clean enough, but that won't get me a front page. Hmmm. Cannibal buffet. New Burger Joint Makes Monster Whoppers."

For some reason, Kenji could tell that Cassidy was lying and it really made him mad, so mad in fact that he bit right through his glass. “Whoa,” said the Onryo. “Easy there, Kenji.” “That gorgon woman is a no-good cocky, lying, adulterous slanderer!” Ryotaro let out a belch before speaking. “Uh-oh,” he said. “Kenji heard a liar.” “What the hell do you care?” asked Mitsuo. “It has nothing to do with you.” “She’s lying about things that you don’t joke about and she’s lying to her husband. That triggers me. There’s nothing worse than a liar. It’s the most arrogant thing you can do. You know that. Judging from that woman’s heartbeat, she probably hasn’t told the truth in months.” The onryo looked forward and stared into Cassidy and gasped. “Kenji’s not kidding,” he said. “That woman is a reporter and from what I see in her mind, everything she writes has a tendency towards slander. Oh my! She’s having an affair.”

Mitsuo let out a gasp. “Are you serious, Takahiro?! That’s horrible.” Kenji was now so mad that he broke his glass in his hand. “I think it’s time we make her pay for her actions. Come on fellas.” The foursome shoveled in what was left of their food and Mitsuo, Kenji and Takahiro left. Ryotaro was about to leave when the gargoyle waitress stopped him and presented him the bill. The oni grumbled and handed the gargoyle girl his entire wallet before following his friends.

 The oni, onryo, werebat and yeti got together over a frying pan on a fire and drew magic circles on the ground. First, Takahiro poured a potion of some sort onto the frying pan. “Ingredients please.” Mitsuo tossed in a bottle of beer. “Some beer,” he said. “For the beer belly.” Ryotaro then took out several balloons and threw them into the frying pan as well. Kenji gave a devilish smirk and then tossed in a Pinocchio doll. “Alright, guys,” said Takahiro. “It’s time to cast the spell.” The four put their hands together to cast a spell. “Magic pan and sacred potion, put our mighty curse in motion. Smoke and fire on a roll, cast a spell from the ancient scroll. Gorgon, gorgon, liar, liar. Under you we’ll light the fire. For every each deceit and every lie, your belly swells to reach the sky. And when we speak in fast reverse, your nasty curse will just get worse. Sky the reach to swells belly your, lie every and deceit each every for. fire the light we’ll you under. Liar, liar, gorgon, gorgon.”

With that a magic light emitted from the cauldron and the curse was going to work. But when does the curse first take effect?
134.title: Dirty Little Liar

135.content:
Belly Dancer Dream- Fatima is an 850ft reticulated python gorgon who belongs to a monster performing troupe. Fatima herself is a belly dancer. However, she recently finds herself being more belly than dancer when she comes across a cobbler who sells her a really strange pair of dancing shoes as she passes by the city of Terrordale (See Monster Shores)

Ice Cold Getaway- Nora is a 900ft tall spitting cobra gorgon who lives in the London-style frozen city of Chillingham. Being a cold-blooded gorgon, she hates the cold and uses a spell book in order to make a potion that she thinks will make her body more tolerant of the cold. Unfortunately, in reality the spell freezes her blood further and gives her the power to control the cold. As another side effect, the more snow there is in her area, the bigger her belly gets.
135.title: More Options

1353.content:
Record Breaker: Nora is a Sidewinder gorgon who wants to get into the records books. Every attempt so far has failed. One day, a friend of hers gives her a suggestion: she could try to go for having the worlds biggest belly. Loving the idea, she sets out on her journey to find a way to get the biggest belly possible.

Curse of the Beer: Delilah is a Hill Keelback gorgon who is obsessed with alcohol. Her drinking has caused her to lose her friends and got her fired from several jobs. The only place she can work is a Hooters-style restaurant that tolerates her drinking. One day, while stumbling home in a drunken stupor, she knocks over a temperamental succubus. Angered, the succubus puts a curse on her: her belly will begin producing alcohol that she can't digest and can't get rid of, and it will never, ever stop.
1353.title: More Options

13533.content: Ar, A Pirate full 'o Gold: Alia is a Diamondback gorgon and a pirate in the 18th Century. As the captain of the Gorgon's Gaze, she and her all-female crew take to the seas to plunder every unfortunate ship they come across, find buried treasure, and cause mayhem. They are known for one odd trait: Alia is obsessed with gold coins and big bellies, so she gives any other treasure to her crew, but takes and swallows all gold coins, making her belly bigger and bigger.
13533.title: More. GIVE ME MORE!

135332.content: One Rocking Belly - Lucia, alias The Punk Empress, is a Boomslang Gorgon and a very famous punk rocker. Her on-stage and off-stage personalities are the same: a wild, foul-mouthed tomboy with a love of beer, women, and oddest of all, big bellies. Her body has an odd reaction to beer: she drinks so much that her body is now a living beer keg. She still gets drunk, but the beer never digests, instead just staying in her belly, making it bigger and bigger. Stranger still, it never gets warm or spoiled in her belly. She adores her massive belly, always drinking more to make it bigger.
135332.title: More options, scurvy dog

1353322.content:
Here's another Option

Hamburgers of the Titans- This one’s a crossover with my interactive Monster Cove. Yasmin Rourke is a 1200ft long and 900ft tall legless ornate flying snake gorgon who lives near San Francisco where she and her business partner, a titanic harpy named Kate Rowling, ran a law firm that served both the humans at their feet and their fellow monsters back in the monster world where they both originated. However, Yasmin used to be a human eater and although she hasn’t swallowed a human for years, she’s still suffering from withdrawal and is looking for an alternative to humans. One day, while out on her lunch break, Yasmin finds a strange burger joint that despite being in the human world, somehow is able to create monster-sized burgers that act as a sort of catnip for monsters, prompting Yasmin to become addicted to the burgers. However, these burgers might not be 100% natural and they have a side effect of not only causing Yasmin’s belly to increase in size, but cause everything else edible to become disgusting to her.
1353322.title: Sing Me More Choices

choices: Skip to After the Lunch Break
13533221.content:
Our story begins at the law firm of Rowling and Rourke. It was a slow day and Yasmin Rourke, one of the two lawyers in charge of the firm was bored out of her mind and tossing pencils into the ceiling as her partner, Kate Rowling was speaking with a client. Of course, Yasmin and Rourke were not ordinary lawyers. They were giant version of the monsters of folklore. Yasmin was a rather chubby 1200ft long and 900ft high gorgon with flying snakes for hair and a flying snake’s tail where her legs should be. Being a gorgon, she had to wear a pair of round turquoise-colored sunglasses to prevent herself from turning people into stone.

Kate was a 1200ft tall harpy resembling an anthropomorphic archaeopteryx with a large beak filled with sharp teeth, pointed leather ears, long blonde hair and feathers arranged in a plumage of red, black, blue, green, pink, gold, cyan, gray, violet and silver. Body shape-wise, Kate was very fat with a large rear and E-cup breasts. Like Yasmin, she always wore a pair of dark glasses, though that was more to do with the fact that she was near-sighted. Despite originating from the Monster World, the two of them had a law firm in San Francisco. It was placed near Alcatraz so the giant women wouldn’t accidentally cause any harm to the big city. Kate at that moment was staring down at a client who seemed intimidated at the ancient bird woman’s gaze.

“Well,” said the human young man looking up at the skyscraper-sized harpy. “How can I put this, Mrs. Rowling. She slipped on a leaf that was on my porch and is threatening to sue.” “Was she injured?” “Well... no.” The client said. Kate let out a sigh. “People seem to think of us lawyers as a means of extortion. Don’t worry. I’d swear on my grandmother’s teeth that there’s no way you can lose.” Yasmin looked ahead to take a peak at the conversation and had to fight back drool. Yasmin had trouble around humans because she used to eat them. She had recently given them up because it would endanger their law firm otherwise. It was easy for Kate not to eat humans. She never started in the first place for one. For another, Kate was married to a human. In fact, she and her husband, Jake, had a human son. By some genetic fluke, the harpy woman gave birth to a male offspring. The reason Rick turned out to be human was because harpies were an exclusively female race.

Yasmin let out a hiss and then started to slither towards the door before Kate noticed her. “Yasmin?” asked Kate. “Where are you going?” Yasmin gave a hiss. “I’m on break, Kate. See you in a while.” “Just be careful, Yasmin. San Fran isn’t exactly built for girls our size.” Yasmin nodded her head and then slithered through the ocean, looking at San Francisco. “Now that’s what I call a buffet,” thought the gorgon giantess to herself as her hair hissed. “No! Those days are over. No more eating humans. Ugh. How does Kate stay so sane and fat? There isn’t much in the human world that’s particularly filling to giant-sized monsters like us.” Yasmin pouted to herself but then she caught wind of something.

“What is that delicious smell?” asked the gorgon giantess. Yasmin followed the scent to see what looked like a houseboat modified into a restaurant. Yasmin licked her lips and looked in surprise to see that on the deck there appeared to be a hamburger that was big enough for a monster like her. “Huh?” she asked. Before Yasmin could question why there was a monster-sized burger, she heard a strange sound like that of a harpsichord and for some reason, it drove her further towards the burger and she picked it up and bit into it. The taste of the burger was so intense that Yasmin couldn’t help but finish it. “Yum!” she yelled.

In the main cabin of the boat, there was a man giving a smirk as another man in a mask was playing a harpsichord. Next to the grill was a tank labeled “Primordial Ooze”. The cook gave an evil laugh. “This giant freaks are too easy,” he said. “This scam is about to pay off big time.” With that, the cook walked out to meet with the eatery’s new gorgon customer. As Yasmin finished the burger, she looked down in surprise at the cook. “Welcome to Titan Burger,” the man said. “The first restaurant in the human world to cater to giant monsters.”
13533221.title: Hamburgers of the Titans

14.content:
Pick your poison gents:

Science

Magic

Or something else...
14.title: Brain Expansion

141.content:
Damn it, Bill, calm down. Yes, lets go with a sciency reason for Brain Expansion. Here's my idea:

A scientist recruits a female gorgon for an experiment. She uses nanobots to act as tiny doctors, examining the gorgon's body and collecting data on her insides. They make it to her brain but sadly malfunction, causing some interesting side effects. I'm sure you can guess what happens next.
141.title: ITS SCIENCE!!!!

1413.content:
Listen. To prove that I'm in it for plot instead of anything erotic, I'm going to do a brain expansion path for a chance. Here are two examples.

Mission Imbecilic - Coral is well, a coral snake gorgon and a delivery woman who has the extreme misfortune upon stumbling upon the lab of a super villain attempting to create a super computer that can bring forth unlimited knowledge. However, Coral causes a violent accident that leads to a piece of metal being stuck in Coral's brain that causes her intelligence to skyrocket but also causes her great pain, slowly transmogrifying her into a MODOK-esque monstrosity. To further complicate things, two bumbling secret agents are sent to find her.

Space Case - In this story, an alien hears about the sorry state that Earth is in and comes to the conclusion that humans are morons that need to evolve fast lest the ruin themselves and the planet, so he comes to the planet with an evolution-inducing machine. Unfortunately, the alien has no idea what humans look like and grabs Quincy, an abrasive, Roswellian ringhals gorgon and evolves her intelligence. Will this mistake cost Roswell greatly?
1413.title: Other...

14131.content:
The time period is the 1970s, a wonderful and simpler time. I time that this narrator personally wishes he was born in. But we can’t decide when we come into the world, so we’ll just come in here, where two secret agents are meeting in a maze of hedges. At the center of the hedge, there is one secret agent who appears to be a lizard man resembling a frilled lizard with a pair of thick glasses and a frill that was bright blue, gray and violet. He was reading a box (upside-down) while waiting for his partner, in front of a rather large and strange looking lawn gnome that appeared to have glasses.

The agent waits for another hour and starts to carve the solar system into the ground before his partner shows up. The lizard man’s partner was a male minotaur who was unusually scrawny despite coming from a species of muscular males and chubby females. he had long brown hair and was wearing a pair of headphones. “What took you so long?” asked the lizard man. The minotaur looked dazed and his head was even spinning before he finally spoke. “I… I got lost. Mr. O really should’ve made the secret meeting place something a whole lot better than a hedge maze.” The lizard man blinked slightly before he spoke back. “You’re a minotaur and you got lost in a maze? What’s wrong with you. Wait. On second thought, don’t tell me. Mr. O has a message for us.”

The lizard man pressed the nose of the gnome and its face moved, revealing a screen of some sort that shadowed a shadowed out figure of a being of unidentifiable species. “Agent Goggles, Agent Varner, welcome. There is a mission of the utmost importance. Eyes on the viewing globe." Agent Goggles adjusted his glasses to get a good look at the screen and had to pull on one of Agent Varner's horns in order to get him to pay attention as the viewing screen turned to static. Agent Varner punched the gnome on the head in order for its vision to return to normal. The screen then depicted a man scientist in a steampunk style outfit complete with a mechanical face and what looked like a bear trap for teeth. He had his arms replaced with robotic claws. "Whoa," said Agent Verner. "That is the worst plastic surgery I've ever seen." Agent Goggles elbowed his partner in order to get him to focus and pay attention.

"This is the dreaded Dr. Ironjaw," said Mr. O. "Wanted on 7 planets and banned from 17 others for his insane experiments. Right now he's cooking up something especially dastardly. Ironjaw is building a super-monitor programmed with the stolen brains of the greatest minds in 7 different dimensions. He is attempted to make himself the smartest person in the galaxy. With that much intelligence in such an unsound mind, who knows what kind of damage it will do." "Well," said Agent Verner. "You could ask the main computer when it's completed." Goggles nudged his partner in the chest in order to make him shut up. "Your mission," said Mr. O. "Is to make sure the super computer is never completed. This tape will now self-destruct." Verner and Goggles panicked as the gnome begun to smoke and was letting out some steam as it was sparking. The two agents screamed and ran around the hedge maze in an attempt to get out before the gnome exploded.

However, it was of no use and the gnome went off with a loud "BOOM!" that destroyed all the flowers in sight and caused the maze to fall down. Goggles and Verner were left for the most part unharmed and only coughed as the entire area was smoked off. "What was that about you criticizing me getting stuck in a maze?" asked Verner. Goggles gave a cough and poked the lenses out of his glasses. "Oh, shut up, Verner."

- - -

Meanwhile, in the center of town in a building that looked dilapidated and had a sign outside that read "NO EVIL LAIR HERE, GO HOME!". Inside the building was Dr. Ironjaw and his jaw was clacking as he was putting the finishing touches on his evil supercomputer. He was attaching the stolen brains to wires as he welded the panels of the computer shut. "Soon," said Dr. Ironjaw in his metallic sounding voice. "Very soon, I will possess all the knowledge in the known universe. Knowledge is power and with that much power at my disposal, I shall become master of the world!" Ironjaw laughed so hard his jaw fell off and he had to reattach it. He gave a grumble as he did so. "I should've gone with a different moniker. This Ironjaw will be the death of me."

Dr. Ironjaw thought that his diabolical plan would come to fruition, but things don't always go as planned. This time, there would be no exception. At that moment, the door opened up and revealed a ditzy-looking gorgon girl with long coral snakes for hair and yellow sunglasses that were shaped like hearts and were glowing bright. She was very skinny in frame, albeit mildly hourglass-shaped and was wearing a polo shirt and jeans with a name tag that read "Coral". In one hand, she was carrying a package and in another hand, she was carrying a lime soda. Ironjaw looked at the girl in surprise.

The gorgon girl paused to sip her soda before she spoke. “Excuse me,” she said. “Is this 772 Moscato Road.” Ironjaw’s jaw rattled and his eyes spun around. 772 Moscato Road? This is 773 Pound Way.” The gorgon girl slapped herself in the face and groaned. “Oh,” she says. “I’m an idiot. The wrong number and the wrong street. My bosses are going to kill me if I don’t deliver this package by 1:00. Huh?” Coral looked all around at the scenery and saw the super computer that Ironjaw had been working on. “Wow,” she says. “If I had a computer like that, crossword puzzles will no longer be a problem.

As Coral walked towards the super computer, Ironjaw noticed her drink. “Be careful with that!” he yelled. “My machine isn’t waterproof! I probably should’ve gone ahead and done that before I built the computer.” Coral gave a laugh. “You don’t have to worry, metal man. This is soda. Whoops!” Coral spilled her soda on the control panel of the machine and it begun to spark violently.

Meanwhile, downtown, Agents Verner and Goggles were driving down the street in a big red car and Verner let out a groan. “Couldn’t you have gotten another car. I feel weird in a red car.” “This was the only car they had left,” said Goggles. “We crashed all the other ones. Ironjaw shouldn’t be too difficult to find. Just look for anything unusual.”

“BOOOOOOOM!!!!”

As the explosion cleared, Verner and Goggles looked up at the smoke and blinked. “Does that count as unusual, Goggles?” asked Verner.

At the scene of the explosion, Ironjaw was unconscious on the ground and Coral was walking away with her head in pain and her hair hissing and standing up on end. “Oh my,” groaned the gorgon. “That was quite a rush. I hope the picture comes out because it was one heck of a flash.. At least my package wasn’t destroyed. I gotta get to the right address or I’m dead meat.”

As Coral was walking away, she failed to notice that there was a piece of metal from the explosion that got stuck in her brain and was sparking.

After Coral walked off, Verner and Goggles walked in and spotted the destroyed lab. “Good grief!” yelled Goggles. “I’ll say,” said Verner as he walked forward to the last surviving wall and noticed a painting hanging on it. “This painting is crooked.” The wall then fell down as the painting caught fire and turned to ash. “It looks like Ironjaw’s super computer plan didn’t work out so well. It’s like what they say about the best laid plans. We better look for Ironjaw.” The two secret agents walked away, not noticing they were walking right past Ironjaw.

Meanwhile, Coral was in her delivery truck and then her eyes flashed because she noticed her crossword puzzle. In seconds, she filled out every single square and put the puzzle away as she begun to drive off. As she was driving, she failed to notice a strange glowing vein appeared on her head as her brain was slowly growing larger.
14131.title: Mission Imbecilic

15.content:
I've never even tried blueberry before myself so here are my options.

1) Life Sentence- This is a crossover with my interactive story, Monster Gaol, Yuri L is a 800ft tall and obese python-type gorgon giantess who is locked up in Under Gloom for life for misusing her gorgon eyes for mass murder for her own twisted amusement. But one day, a mad doctor comes to Warden Destiny to sell her a new method for keeping criminals from escaping Under Gloom. This method has unpredictable consequences and Yuri is selected to be the guinea pig for the procedure because her life sentence renders her expendable.

2) Soda Popped- Jojo is a chubby boa constrictor gorgon who has volunteering to test out a strange new drink from BANG! Cola. What she doesn't know is that the cyclops head of the company is a witch and the soda contains... questionable ingredients.

3) Muffin Mess- Maureen is a 750ft tall death adder gorgon shut-in living in Horrorville across the street from the Monster Arms apartment building. One day some mysterious girl scouts sell her some strange muffins. The normally anti-social gorgon finds herself drawn to these muffins and buys some, not knowing that these muffins contain a rather unusual kind of poison.

4) Lip Service- Aubrey is a an anaconda gorgon who lives in London with her human husband. One day a traveling cosmetic salesman ends up at her door while her husband is away and sells her case of strange makeups. But it is the lipstick in which the real chaos lies.
15.title: Blueberry Expansion

151.content:
It was another day in Fearfield at Under Gloom, the most awful and disgusting prison known to all giant monster kind. In the office of the warden, there were three monsters. First of them was Warden Destiny Sirtis herself. Destiny was a 1000ft tall blue skinned gargoyle with an uncanny resemblance to Demona with the obvious exception of the crown. Next to her was the assistant warden, Belladonna Solanaceae, a 700ft tall yellow skinned manticore woman with three sets of razor sharp teeth and an hourglass figure.

The third monster in the room was a Frankenstein woman, a monster made of both flesh and steel. This particular Frankenstein woman was an obese pale white skinned patchwork corpse with pieces of cloth stitched into her body and a glasgow grin from the stitches on her face. She had strawberry blonde hair worn in a beehive and was wearing a pair of glasses with a lab coat. Her left arm was flesh but her right arm was mechanical and was very undersized compared to her much larger and muscular organic arm.

"I don't know if I follow you, Dr. Goodwitch," said Destiny. "You're saying you've developed a way to keep the troublemakers in this building completely immobilized and out of my hair." "Exactly," said Dr. Goodwitch as she held up a syringe. "In this very syringe is an experimental solution I've been dabbling with. I know you've had problems with attempted escapees and you and your staff are so frustrated that you're taking it out on each other. You in particular Destiny. Your blood pressure is so high it's a miracle you're even alive." Belladonna let out a yawn. "Cut to the chase, Doc. What's that crazy blue stuff do?"

"All in due time vice warden," said Dr. Goodwitch. "To demonstrate, I'll need a guinea pig to test the syringe on." Destiny was thinking to herself. "I know just the deserving waste of life for the job," she said with a smirk. "But unfortunately he's in the pit for the week for destroying the kitchen. I have someone else in mind. Yuri L. That way, in case the experiment fails, no big loss."

Yuri was in her cell at that moment, she was an 800ft tall and obese gorgon with blue pythons for hair. She had a visor attached to her fave to cancel out her petrifying gaze. Yuri was a serial killer who turned monsters into stone corpses that she would then mutilate for her own twisted amusement. Now, she was spending a life sentence in the Dark Side. Dark Side was the part of Under Gloom where they kept the most evil criminals. Criminals whose crimes were so vile they were left to rot. Dark Side's name came from the fact that the prison staff didn't even bother to turn the lights on in that area of the prison.

Right now, Yurielle was getting into an argument across the way from fellow inmate, Persephone, an albino werewolf arrested for cannibalism. "What the **** did you just say about me, you damned pooch!?" "I said that my body count is higher, you snake haired moron." "Listen here you mongrel, I oughta come in there and neuter you, you stupid mutt!" "I'd like to see you try," said Persephone. "I can eat you in over 900 ways with just my front teeth." "I'd rip out your intestines and use them to strangle you, you tree pissing literal daughter of a...."

Suddenly Yuri let out a yell because she was tasered. As Yuri was recovering from the shock, two guards entered her cell. One of them was Cree, an 800ft tall and grotesquely obese were hyena and the other was Clover, a gigantic grootslang, a green skinned hybrid monster of an elephant and a snake.

While Cree and Clover held the gorgon down, Destiny and Dr. Goodwitch walked into the cell. "Destiny," said Yuri with a hiss. "You three-layered anus hole. I'm gonna..." "You're gonna what?" asked Destiny. "You already have life. Don't push it." Yuri's snakes let out a hiss as Dr. Goodwitch held up her syringe filled with mysterious blue liquid. "Don't fight it, Yuri. Resistance will forever be futile for you and for your future prisoners."

Without a second thought Dr. Goodwitch injected Yuri right in the...
151.title: Life Sentence

choices: During Chow Time at the Cafeteria
1511.content:
... belly. Dr. Goodwitch swung the hypodermic needle and jabbed it right into Yuri's stomach. Yuri let out a scream and held her stomach in pain. "Zeus damn it!" yelled the gorgon. "What the hell was that." Dr. Goodwitch then squeezed the needle to make the blue liquid ooze out. "You might feel a little light-headed, Ms. L," said the Frankenstein giantess. "But it should keep you in line."

"Screw you," said Ms. L to Dr. Goodwitch before she turned her attention to Warden Destiny. "And screw you too, Demona!" Destiny let out an angry shriek as she made her eyes glow red. Destiny was fully aware of her resemblance to the cartoon villain and she was really not amused with it, so calling her "Demona" never failed to throw the warden into a vicious rage. Destiny would've assaulted Yuri but Belladonna held her back.

"Calm down, Destiny," said Dr. Goodwitch. "My blueberry solution will render her and all the other malcontents powerless to challenge or undermine your authority." Destiny just let out a hiss. "I hope so," she said. "Because if this works on this, this menace to society, I'm going to use it on the rest of the Dark Siders. They're in for life, so I'd appreciate it if they didn't complain and make a big stink about it. After all, they've got nobody to blame for being in this hellhole but themselves."

"Ball me!" yelled Yuri as he snake hair hissed. Destiny lowered her head with glowing eyes. "You are getting to be as bad as Wade. I told that little malcontent that I'd eat him for breakfast the next time he acted up. I can't do that with you, but I intend to see you suffer." Yuri held up her snake hair and glared at the warden but it was no use.

The blueberry poison would take its effects...
1511.title: Jab in the Front

choices: The Guards Come in to Investigate
The Warden Herself Comes in to Investigate
15112.content:
It wasn't long before it was lunch time in the prison's cafeteria. Prison food was not by any means of the imagination supposed to taste good. However, given the bizarre and disgusting items that monsters considered to be food, Under Gloom's cuisine was barely edible and almost poisonous. Most of the chow in the prison's cafeteria wasn't fit for rats. Today was no exception.

Yuri walked out of line for chow with a plate full of unidentifiable slop that looked like it expired years ago and couldn't even be distinguished from vegetable or meat. It was even coated with a putrid purple ooze that looked like venom. Yuri sniffed the prison food and gagged before walking off to find a table.

As she was walking by, she stole a cup of what looked like gelatin dessert from another inmate; Priscilla, a white skinned orc sorceress in for practicing medicine without a license. "Hey!" yelled Priscilla. "Yuri! That was mine!" Priscilla then yelled in pain as Yuri drove one of her snakes up the orc giantess's nose. "So?!" asked the gorgon. Priscilla fell back on the ground in pain before Yuri grabbed the rest of Priscilla's tray and poured it over the orc.

Yuri walked off as a cockatrice inmate looked at her. "Bitch." The cockatrice said under her breath. The cockatrice then wound up with a black eye. Yuri was walking towards a table where there was another prisoners sitting down. It was Arethusa, a brown skinned and blonde haired European dragon who was locked up in the Dark Side for construction, use and selling of bombs that were used to kill people. "Get out of my seat dragon breath." Said Yuri. Arethusa just snorted out flames. "No, I don't think I will. I don't see your name on it lardass." Yuri's snake hair hissed and Arethusa got up to growl as flames came out of her mouth.

"Listen asshole," said Yuri. "If it weren't for this Zeus damned visor, I would petrify you, break your head into gravel and flush it down the toilet." "I'd like to see you try." "What was that?" "I'D LIKE TO SEE YOU TRY!"

Yuri would've attacked Arethusa but then she gagged and held her chest. She groaned and looked at her hands to see they were turning blue. "What's going on?!" yelled Arethusa." Yuri gagged and begun to sweat before she felt her already fat body expanding and she fell back as she continued to turn blue. "Wh-What is happening to me?" asked the gorgon girl. Yuri found herself swelling to the point of being spherical as the other inmates, Arethusa included, looked on in fear. Something strange was going on.
15112.title: Chow Time

choices: Destiny Rolls Yuri Back to her Cell
Destiny Decides to Give Another Inmate the Blueberry Treatment
151122.content:
The doors to the cafeteria opened up and all the inmates stepped back in fear as Warden Destiny walked in, followed by Dr. Goodwitch. Destiny looked ahead and her jaw dropped as she looked at Yuri huffing and puffing. "Help, me!" yelled Yuri. "Help me! Oh! Oh!" Dr. Goodwitch took out a pipe to smoke it as Yuri's legs and arms swelled so much they seemed to disappear into the gorgon girl's round blue body. Yuri's chin even merged with the rest of her face as she was gasping for air while her breasts seemed to hand on her torso.

Destiny walked forward and was dumbfounded as she felt Yuri's bloated body. "I don't believe it," said Destiny. "Is that what your crazy potion was supposed to do?" "Yep," said Dr. Goodwitch as she puffed on her pipe. "This blueberry poison I've invented induces an unusual form of swelling that mutates the inmates into living blueberries. Of course, an antidote for it does exist in case you want to reverse the damage."

Yuri's hair let out an angry hiss and even tried to bite Dr. Goodwitch. "You fat sadistic pile of used parts!" yelled the blueberry gorgon. "You should be locked up in Dark Side! Destiny oughta fry your freaking ass off." Yuri then yelled as she swelled again and was now as round as a beach ball and rolled across the floor. Several of the inmates had to run and those that failed to get out of the way were bowled over like pins.

Finally, Destiny flew over Yuri and stopped her. The gargoyle warden gave a smirk at the sight. "You know," she said. "I kind of like the results? Dr. Goodwitch, how would this work on a human?" "I'm afraid that the poison is so strong it would kill a human with the first injection, Warden Destiny." Said Goodwitch. "Damn," said Destiny. "Oh well, can't have everything." "Screw your face!" yelled Yuri as her hair hissed. "You sick freak. Somebody oughta pump this crap into you. You're already blue." Yuri then heard a flowing liquid and was really afraid when she learned the sound was coming from her chest.

Destiny let out a vicious laugh that terrified the other inmates. "Let this serve as a warning," the warden says. "Anybody who acts up will share Yuri's fate."

What happens now?
151122.title: Pleased with the Results

1511221.content:
"Clover, Cree. Get back to your posts. I'm going to roll this piece of juicy trash back to her cell. I want her to savor her new punishment." Destiny said with a grin on her face. Clover and Cree complied and left, as Destiny started rolling Yuri. She angled her in a way so that Yuri's snake hair couldn't reach her.

As Destiny rolled her, Yuri was steaming mad. That a-hole doctor just turned her into a giant blueberry freak. And Destiny was loving it. Yuri could feel her blood boil. When she got back to normal, she was going to tear those two apart.

Eventually, Yuri was put back in her cell. Since Destiny assumed she wasn't in any condition to move, she didn't bother locking the door. Yuri was left alone in her cell, bloated and furious.

Across from her, Persephone was laughing. "Oh man. This is too good. You look so stupid." She said in between laughs.

"Can it, you literal bitch!" Yuri screamed.

"I heard what happened in the cafeteria. You turned it into a bowling lane. Did you get a strike?" Persephone asked, struggling to breath from all her laughing.

Yuri was about to shout back, but then she realized something. Persephone had given her an idea! If she could knock over several inmates at once, then what's to say she can't do the same with guards? If she started rolling, they'd have to get out of the way. Maybe she could turn this punishment into an escape plan.

But first, she'd have to test something: can she actually move herself? Using all her strength, she tries to roll her massive blue body foward. Does it work?
1511221.title: A Potential Escape Plan

15112211.content:
Yuri grunts as she leans forward and then she sees that she is indeed rolling. "Yes!" thought the evil gorgon blueberry to herself. "Yes. This is it." Yuri then rolled herself backwards and then forward and pushed the cell door open. "Yes!" As she continued to roll, Yuri passed several jail cells, all with a smirk on her face. "This is it!" The gorgon girl gave an evil laugh as she rolled down the prison hallway. "No prison can hold Yuri L!" she yelled. "Here I come!"

Down the hall was one of the guards. Her name was Icy Coldwind and she was a bright blue feathered snow bird harpy. The harpy was making her rounds and making sure everyone was still locked up. Icy of course, was still new to Under Gloom's staff and was still familiarizing herself with the entire prison's inmates. "Let's see," said Icy. "Ursula Majors is in her cell. And in Elaine's cell. There's no way I'm falling for that trap again. Huh, what's that...?" Icy turned her head and screamed as her eyes popped out.

The harpy couldn't get out of the way in time as Yuri rolled over her and flattened her like a cartoon character. Icy squawked as her flattened body rolled underneath an empty cell and she stuck out in tongue in a daze. "Look out guards!" yelled Yuri. "Coming through!" As Yuri rolled, her blueberry body got bigger and rounder to the point where her limbs sunk into her blue flesh. As Yuri kept rolling, she managed to flatten Cree and Clover before they could even realize what happened. Clover managed to stagger up as she heard Yuri laughing. "Aria!" yelled Clover. "Look out!"

Up ahead was Aria Tazel, a giant onryo with huge Z-cup breasts and long black hair like a Japanese movie ghoul. Aria was the highest ranked guard in Under Gloom and was a cop in life. As Aria was floating above the floor, she spotted Yuri coming and held her guard. Yuri continued to laugh but then she saw Aria's huge breasts in the way. "Uh-oh!"

The blueberry gorgon bounced off of Aria's breasts and then off the walls as she grunted, screaming in pain as she hit the cell doors and then was sent into the stair well as she was rolling downstairs grunting and groaning. On the ground floor, Wade Wilson, the sole human inmate was plotting another escape. "Finally," he said to himself. "Once I reach the basement I can just tunnel my way and say goodbye to Demona and this stupid pris..." Before Wade could finish his sentence, Yuri rolled over him and lodged him into her belly button as he yelled.

"Okay," muttered Yuri. "This is a setback. Oh no!" With that, Yuri rolled....
15112211.title: Rolling Gorgon

151122112.content:
Yuri tumbled and rolled and screamed before she landed with a crash in the prison garden in a patch of dirt where the prisoners were forced to care for the strange flowers that only grow in the monster world. The blueberry gorgon gagged as the pythons on her head spat up dirt. "Oh terrific," complained the gorgon. "Not only am I a blueberry, but I'm a dirty blueberry!" Yuri started to scream and cry before she heard footsteps. "Well, well, well, what do we have here?" asked a familiar-sounding voice. "Oh no!" groaned Yuri. That voice was coming from Destiny and the blue gargoyle came forward and poked Yuri as she groaned. "It looks like we found the perfect patch for the world's biggest blueberry."

Yuri grit her teeth in anger. "I'd like to turn you to into a statue!" Destiny scoffed. "I'm already a statue, stupid." Destiny then kicked up more dirt to bury what was left of Yuri's feet. "Hey!" Yuri tried to roll over Destiny but then she gagged because she expanded again and was bluer than ever. She was now completely immobile. Yuri begun to cry again as Destiny smirked. "You deserve this, you know. Maybe now you'll know the despair faced by the family and friends of every last monster you petrified in cold blood. Or right now, cold juice." "You're the epitome of evil!" yelled Yuri. "I hope you die from your rage!" Destiny smirked and then walked away as Yuri groaned.

The gorgon looked around to see all the strange plants that grew in the prison garden. There were two-headed conjoined daisies, hand-shaped mums, roses that looked like they were made of metal and even violets that looked like they had tongues. Yuri let out a sneeze and groaned. She was one of the prisoners of Under Gloom who absolutely hated to be in the garden. She had allergies and Destiny knew it darn well. To make matters worse, it started to rain and the rain came down fast and hard. Yuri yelled as the water poured into her mouth at a rapid speed. She had to spit water out fast to avoid choking as her hair curled up.

“I really, really, really hate that Destiny Sirtis!” yelled Yuri. “I may have done some horrible things, but that woman is an outright sadist! I’d love to put her in the same boat as me. Then again, she’s already blue. But I'd love to see her expand. I wonder if Dr. Goodwitch's poison has any effect on gargoyles." Yuri grunted and tried to shake free but as she did was flip upside down because she was too round to move. The gorgon was swearing under her breath as her snake hair hissed loudly and snapped their jaws.

"Well, well, well. It looks like you might need some help." Yuri let out a grunt. "Who said that?" the gorgon giantess blueberry asked. "Oh," said the voice again as the voice's owner walked up towards Yuri. "Just a small timer who'd like to rise up in Under Gloom's ranks by helping out one of the more infamous inmates. Besides, I don't like gardening in the rain either, but that warden can be so mean. But then again, gargoyles are hard on crime." Yuri felt a couple hands on her and groaned as she was rolled upwards and then she looked eye to eye (her visor blocking her petrifying gaze) and saw exactly what small timer would dare team up with a stone cold killer like her...
151122112.title: Snake in the Garden

1511222.content:
Yuri was swearing rapidly as her new blueberry transformed body was rolled out of the cafeteria by the guards. She was so angry at her condition that she appeared to be foaming at the most. The other inmates looked in fear. The orc sorceress, Priscilla, imprisoned for impersonating a doctor, had the nerve to speak with another inmate, Eva, a Jersey devil imprisoned for insider trading, about the situation. "Yikes," whispered Priscilla. "What a horrible fate. You think that transformation is permanent?" Eva nervously bit her fingers. "Destiny's not that cruel, I don't think. She'll probably reverse the effects once Yuri serves her sentence." "But, Eva," said Priscilla. "By the time Yuri is complete with her sentence, she'll be dead. Demona's really flipped her lid this time."

Destiny turned her head and then faced Priscilla. "Did you say something? Priscilla?" Priscilla nervously shook her head and waved her hands. "I didn't think so," said Destiny. "Since Yuri is serving a life sentence, I'm not even going to bother using the antidote on her. Anybody caught misbehaving one time too often, will be blueberry-poisoned for the remained of their sentence." All the inmates are frozen in fear as Destiny left the cafeteria with Dr. Goodwitch.

"For the rest of their sentence?" asked the frankenstein giantess to the gargoyle warden. "That sounds harsh." Destiny let out a scoff. "These aren't ordinary people. These are society's embarrassments that chose to murder, rob, swindle and otherwise commit wrongs against their fellow monsters. They deserve no mercy. There are three off the bat that I can think of, joining Yuri." "Who?" asked Dr. Goodwitch.

"First is the one monster I'm sure could escape on her own given the wrong circumstances. Persephone, that white werewolf in for cannibalizing hundreds of monsters of countless species. She's so vicious that I don't let her out of her cell. I had to muzzle the literal bitch because otherwise she'd eat the guards and other inmates. If she was a blueberry, she'd never be able to escape. Additionally, there's that jewel thief, Bebe. That Cheshire Cat's not bad herself, but she's in love with that MF-er Wade whose always trying to break out. She might try to help him out out of her misplaced love and loyalty. She wouldn't be of much use to that troublemaker bloated." Dr. Goodwitch nodded her head. "And the third one."

Destiny hissed. "That gremlin, Ariel. She got thrown in here for dismantling cars to sell the parts on the black market. Gremlins being good tinkerers makes them resourceful enough to be capable of breaking out. I don't like to take chances." "What about that kitsune on level five?" asked Dr. Goodwitch. "Her shapeshifting could spell trouble." Destiny nodded her head. "Elaine," she muttered. "Thanks for reminding me. That identity thief probably couldn't do much as a blueberry. But who to use the blueberry poison on first?"
1511222.title: Possibilities, Possibilities

15112222.content: Okay, but which one of them will be blueberried?
15112222.title: Bebe or Persephone

choices: It Takes a While Before it Works
151122221.content:
Destiny snapped her clawed fingers as she gave a fanged grin. "I know exactly who to use the blueberry poison on," the gargoyle giantess said. "Bebe is about to learn just what happens when you give your heart to somebody who'll only abuse it." At that time, Bebe was in her jail cell talking to Wade who was once again trying to escape. At 400ft tall, Bebe wasn't a particularly large inmate, but she was heavily muscular. She was imprisoned for a bunch of Catwoman-style jewel robberies and ever since she came to Under Gloom, she's been working out in the prison gymnasium.

Bebe was actually much nicer than the other inmates in terms of disposition. Unfortunately she had fallen in love with Wade Wilson. Unlike the other inmates who were giant monsters, Wade was a normal-sized human and the only male in the prison. Unlike Bebe, he was a total jerk with a racist hatred to monsters. He was an awful human being as well; car robbery, destruction of private property, assault and battery, those were only a few of the crimes that Wade committed. He had a volatile temper and a nasty habit for Disproportionate Retribution. He lived in Van Nuys until a mummy giantess was hired to play a role in a monster movie. Her name was Cleotiti Su-Ancknamun, and she accidentally stepped on Wade's car and destroyed it. In retaliation, Wade set her gauze on fire and nearly burned her undead. The once human-loving Cleotiti was so traumatized that she would have a panic attack upon seeing a human. Because of the property damage caused by Cleotiti's panic attack, Wade was sent to Under Gloom. Destiny despised Wade more than any other prisoner because not only did he constantly try to escape, but he was nothing but rude and insulting towards her and everyone else in the prison. What Bebe could possibly see in him was beyond anyone else.

"Alright, Bebe," said Wade. "You know the plan." Bebe nodded her head and purred. "Today, I'm on garden duty. I'll smuggle you out into the prison garden and toss you over the fence. But Wade, what if you get hurt?" Wade let out a scoff. "Last time, Demona threw me back in, I tore off a piece of her shirt. It should make a good parachute. Although I probably would've had better luck if I snagged her panties. And once I get out, I'll come back for you." Bebe smiled at that, not noticing that Wade had his fingers crossed. "There's just one problem with your plan, Wade." Said Destiny as she walked to the jail cell. Bebe looked up in fear at Destiny but Wade looked in contempt. "Demona!" he yelled. "And it looks like you brought Frankenstein's leftovers as well!" Dr. Goodwitch walked up behind Destiny as Destiny turned to Bebe who was still in fear. "Please don't hurt him." Begged Bebe.

"Not this time," said Destiny. "Bebe, I warned you about consorting with bad company before. Dr. Goodwitch." Dr. Goodwitch polished her syringe as Bebe meowed in fear. "Relax, Bebe," said Destiny. "It's like one of those evil brews that bitch Antoinette used to make." "Antoinette Curry?" asked Dr. Goodwitch. "That nuckalavee was pure evil. She had no right to call herself a doctor after everything she did. Didn't she die here?" Destiny scoffed. "Good riddance," said Destiny. "I hope she's eating centipedes in hell right now. Enough with the chit-chat, get it over with. Wade would've slipped through the bars in Bebe's cage and escaped, but Destiny put a board in front of the bottom of the cell to block the escape. "I want you to see your only ally in this prison being reduced to uselessness."

Bebe yelled in pain as Dr. Goodwitch inject the blueberry poison into her system and she begun to grumble.
151122221.title: Bebe the Blueberry Cheshire Cat

1511222211.content:
As Bebe was recoiling from the sting of the injection, she felt her chest and her eyes popped because her muscles felt softer than she recalled. "Huh?" asked Bebe. "My muscles. What's happening to them. They feel surprisingly soft." Wade looked up and saw that Bebe's body was turning as blue as Destiny's. Scratch that, it was even bluer. "What was that crap?" asked Wade. Destiny just gave a sinister laugh as Bebe felt her rear getting rounder and from the looks of it, her front was going the same way as her muscles were slowly disappearing.

Bebe let out a frantic meow as she felt her muscular arms getting soft and merging into her skin as her face and her torso were getting increasingly rounder. Bebe got on all fours and let out a feline roar as her limbs started to get rounder as well and she begun to expand, assuming the same blueberry shape as Yuri did. "What the hell?!" yelled Wade. "What's going on?!" "Oh," says Destiny. "Just your one hope to bust out of your well deserved prison sentence going up, up, up in blueberry flames."

Bebe was now a blueberry cat as round as Yuri and was horrified at what she had begun. "No way!" she yelled. "It took me months to get that body! Look at me! I've never been this bloated in my life. Ack! And my mouth tastes like blueberries. I'm allergic to blueberries. Bebe meowed as she rolled onto her back and was rolling towards Wade. "No!" yelled Wade as the blueberry Cheshire cat giantess rolled towards him. "No! No! No!" Wade tried to run but found himself trapped and mumbling underneath Bebe's blueberry hulk.

Destiny laughed at the display as Bebe blushed. "My word," said Dr. Goodwitch. "For whatever reason, Bebe turned into a blueberry faster than Georgia did. How is that possible?" Destiny turned to the frankenstein giantess as both of them walked away leaving Wade trapped under the blueberry transmogrified Bebe. "Perhaps it takes longer in reptilian-type monsters or other cold blooded monsters such as a gorgon like Yuri," the gargoyle said. "I must commend you on the blueberry poison, Dr. Goodwitch. I can't see anybody disrespecting my authority now. You might have even demotivated hundreds of monsters from a life of crime." Both of them laughed as they walked off.

Which victim of the blueberry poison do you follow now?
1511222211.title: The Blueberry Poison Works Instantly

151122222.content:
“You know,” said Destiny. “It’s a pain in the ass to constantly have to keep Persephone locked up and under guard. That cannibal is a ticking time bomb waiting to go off. You know, Dr. Goodwitch, I think that this might very well be the best invention in anti-crook technology. I might just recommend you for an award.” Dr. Goodwitch smiled but then her dead skin turned pale. “Wait a minute,” she said. “You actually want to try my blueberry poison on Persephone? You should’ve executed her if what I heard about her was true. I heard that she once ate a bus load of tourists all the way from Chillingham and picked her teeth with the driver’s ribs.” Destiny gave a gag. “Persephone never scared ME. Gargoyle meat is too hard to chew to be edible. Don’t worry. If she makes a move towards you, I’ll remind that mutt who the top dog is.”

In her cell at the time, Persephone was trying to pick her muzzle free right when one of the guards came to give her lunch. The guard was Clover Marathon, a bright green skinned grootslang, a hybrid of an elephant and a snake. She resembled an anthropomorphic African elephant with scaly skin and a cobra for a trunk. She also had yellow hair in a Bob haircut that made her resemble a certain spy cartoon character of the same first name. Persephone looked at the sorry excuse for food and couldn’t identify it as meat or vegetables. She even sniffed it before turning to face Clover. “Is this it? I would’ve preferred a grootslang’s heart, roasted on a stick with cinnamon. “You’re not eating me today, you albino mongrel,” said Clover. “I can’t wait for the day when the Warden finally decides to fry you.” Persephone just spat at Clover to make her jump back. “I wouldn’t be nasty, little elephant,” said the murderous wolf. “You’ll be in my tummy one of these days.” Clover, not wanting to take any chances with the most dangerous villain in the Dark Side, quickly moves away from the cell as to avoid any accidents in case Persephone did manage to get out of her muzzle.

Persephone just shrugged and started to lap up as much of her dinner as she can with her muzzle in the way. Then she heard footsteps and Destiny was there with Dr. Goodwitch by her side. “Hello, Persephone.” Said Destiny with venom in her voice. Persephone spotted the extremely nervous Dr. Goodwitch and smiled evilly as she licked her lips in anticipation. “Oh good,” she said. “You brought some real food. Frankensteins give me gas, but I think I can manage.” “All you’ll be eating is your words, you many werewolf,” said Destiny. “It’s become a real bother keeping you locked up all the time, which is why I’m going to do something about you.” Dr. Goodwitch nervously holds up the syringe with the blueberry poison.

“Something isn’t right,” said Persephone. “Under Gloom doesn’t use lethal injection.” Persephone growled and then she heard a clicking because Destiny was unlocking her muzzle. “You’re not going to be needing this any more, Howler. It would only be redundant.” Persephone gave an evil smirk and showed her sharp teeth as she licked her lips and looked at Dr. Goodwitch in hunger. Dr. Goodwitch screamed as Persephone growled and leapt at her to try and bite her neck, but before the wolf could eat Dr. Goodwitch, Destiny grabbed her in a bear hug. Persephone growled and tried to scratch and bite Destiny. “Now, Dr. Goodwitch! Hurry!” Dr. Goodwitch hesitated slightly in fear but then she managed to inject Persephone as Persephone let out a growl.

Persephone then grunted and held onto her stomach as it was gurgling. “What the?” she asks. “What’s going...?” That was when the wolf’s body turned blue and was expanding. The werewolf giantess cannibal growled as she expanded until she was as big and blue and round as Yuri. Persephone growled as she tried desperately to chomp on Dr. Goodwitch but she couldn’t reach her. Destiny led the doctor out and locked Persephone’s cell. Dr. Goodwitch was panting heavily as Destiny smiled at her. “Thank you, Dr. Goodwitch. I believe that my job as warden will be much easier with your poison.” Destiny gave a laugh as both Yuri and Persephone overheard and both were savage.

Whose P.O.V. do we follow now?
151122222.title: Hear the Wolf Cry to the Blueberry Moon

155.content:
Ad Revenue: Holly is an overweight Asp gorgon and the new spokeswoman for the Clawson Medical and Health Drink company. The company's R&D department have managed to create an odd new health drink for women: it turns them into giant blueberries by converting fat into blueberry juice, and then a few hours later, the juice is removed, making the drinker thin and fit. Holly is asked to act in a commercial for it, and as such, drinks it and becomes a berry herself. But there's an unfortunate side effect: due to an error in the ingredients, the drinker can't be juiced at all!

Top of the World: Tasha, an Egyptian Cobra gorgon, has just become the CEO of a powerful shipping company. She lets the power go to her head, and treats the employees like dirt. Angered, the disgruntled workers devise a plan for revenge: with the help of a local chemist, they will spike Tasha's coffee with a special chemical that will turn her into a giant blueberry that can never be juiced.
155.title: More Juicy Options

1553.content:
Life as a Blueberry: Tori is a Mountain Adder gorgon who, due to an incident involving an ex-lover and a chemical concoction, has been transformed into a giant blueberry that can never be juiced. This story actually starts a week after the incident, where Tori is still adjusting to her new life with a kind kitsune nurse helping her.

Love in All Sizes: Mary and Scarlet are a pair of gorgon lovers (Mary is a Bolivian Anaconda, Scarlet is a Cuban Boa) who are engaged to be married. One day, while visiting Mary at her work in a chemical plant, Scarlet accidentally drinks a concoction that permanently turns her into a massive blueberry. Now she has to deal with her new form, while hoping Mary will still love her.
1553.title: More options

15533.content: Blueberry Goddess: Natasha is a Sahara Sand Viper gorgon with an extreme god complex. She is completely obsessed with being worshiped and dominating anyone she views as beneath her. One day, she comes across another gorgon who was permanently turned into a large blueberry in a science accident. This other female gorgon is being loved by a few people. Furious that someone is taking attention from her, Natasha seeks to recreate the accident and become a blueberry goddess.
15533.title: More Stories

choices: No, it takes a little bit
155331.content:
Everyone feels prideful from time to time, but they still have the common sense to be humble about it. Nobody ever told that to Natasha Seldon.

Natasha was a 35-year-old Sahara Sand Viper gorgon. She was 5'10'', covered in tan scales with light brown spots, had green eyes, and Sahara Sand Vipers for hair. She had a pronounced hourglass figure that was complemented by her suit.

Natasha was the CEO of SandCorp, a company specializing in chemicals. The years of being on top had inflated her ego to insane degrees, and people even thought she had a god complex. She viewed everyone as beneath her, using them like tools then tossing them away when she didn't need them. She was also incredibly vain. In her mind, she had to be the center of attention. Everyone had to focus on her. And everyone did.

Well, usually. Because today, as Natasha walked through SandCorp's lobby, she was annoyed to see that no one had flocked to her like usual. Instead, everyone was gathered around something off to the side. From where Natasha stood, it looked like a giant ball, 6' in height and diameter. Confused and angered that no one was paying attention to her, she walked over to see what was so important.

What she saw when she got there confused her. In the center of the circle wasn't a ball, but another female gorgon. The woman had a gorgon head, but her body had become a massive sphere, with her hands and feet sucked into her body. Her breasts were the only thing that weren't absorbed by her body, having turned massive. Natasha also saw that the gorgon's scales had turned dark blue. Her cheeks were also puffed out. She was wearing a tee shirt and pants that somehow fit her body.

Natasha recognized her as Cary, a scientist in the R&D lab. But Natasha had seen her yesterday and she was normal. What had happened?

"All right, everyone, enough gawking. Get back to work!" Natasha yelled.

Finally realizing their boss had shown up, everyone left, leaving only Cary in the middle of the floor.

"Thanks boss. It was getting kinda crowded." Cary said, relived.

"Cary, what happened to you? And why was everyone focusing on you? They should be focusing on me!"

"Well, yesterday, I was in R&D, overseeing the production of a new flavor enchancer, when another worker spilled some chemicals on me. I was only shaken at first, but then my scales turned blue and I started blowing up until I wound up like this."

Natasha got up close to her and poked her side. When she did, she heard the sound of liquid sloshing around.

"What is that?" Natasha asked.

"Blueberry juice. Those chemicals turned me into a giant blueberry." Cary replied. "They spent hours trying to juice me but nothing worked. Eventually, a doctor checked me out and said I might be stuck like this forever. Though it's not so bad. Everyone seems to think I look good this way, and have been showering attention on me."

At that, Natasha mentally screamed. 'They should be paying attention to ME, not this bloated ball. If this is what they want, then fine! I'll get their attention back!'

"What chemicals were spilled on you?" She asked.

"Um..." Cary replied, closing her eyes to remember. "D448, T199, B634, and R144."

When she opened her eyes again, she saw Natasha walking away, leaving her alone in the lobby.

"Um, can someone roll me to my office?" She called out.
--------------------------------------------------
Natasha stormed into R&D, surprising everyone.

"You," She pointed at a random scientist. "I need chemicals, NOW!"

"Which ones?"

"D448, T199, B634, and R144. And bring me two of each."

"But-"

"NOW!"

The scientist complied and went to get them. A few minutes later, he came back with 8 bottles of blue liquids. Without saying anything, Natasha grabbed them, opened the bottles, and dumped the chemicals on herself.

"ARE YOU MAD?!" The scientist replied.

"Quiet, Tarleton." Natasha replied. "If Cary thinks she can take my attention from me, she's wrong. If one dose of this junk made her that big, two doses will make me twice as big. Then everyone will love me again."

Do the chemicals take effect now?
155331.title: Blueberry Goddess

1553311.content:
Almost as soon as the last drop of chemicals hit Natasha's snake hair, she could feel something. It felt like a churning in her stomach. Looking down, she saw that her belly had begin to grow.

'The chemicals are working!' Natasha thought. She then brought her hands up to her face. Sure enough, they had begun to turn blue. Turning on her heel, Natasha ran out of the R&D lab and ran to her office, which was down the hall. (She didn't want to waste time using the elevator to get to R&D.)

Closing the door behind her, Natasha could feel the growth in her belly speed up. She now looked like she was 6 months pregnant. She also took note that her bust had begun to blow up too. And though she couldn't see it, she could feel her butt grow too. She gave her butt a slight slap, and heard a sloshing sound come from it. The blueberry juice was filling her quickly.

After a few minutes, she felt her arms and legs begin to inflate too, becoming conical. By this point, her body had blown up to be quite big. Her breasts had become ZZ cups, her belly had become an overinflated yoga ball, and her butt looked like two beach balls. The blue on her body had also spread to her legs and torso. Only her head was still it's normal color. Through all this, Natasha could only think 'I'll show up Cary. She thinks she can take attention from me as a blueberry.'

After a few more minutes, it had happened. Natasha's body had inflated to the point where it was almost a perfect sphere. Natasha had become as big as Cary, with the exception of her breasts being slightly bigger. She had also now turned completely blue. Somehow, throughout this ordeal, her suit hadn't burst. She guessed the chemicals had made it stretchy. She wasn't completey sure.

It was at this point that she discovered...
1553311.title: The Fun Begins Right Away

choices: They ignore her in favor of Cary
15533112.content:
Natasha realized that she wasn't done growing yet. This both worried and excited her. If she could get bigger, maybe she had a chance to get all that attention back from Cary.

So she continued to swell up, going past the 6 feet Cary had been. She was thankful that she had picked a room with very high ceilings. After an incident involving a gorgon becoming a giantess, she had both high ceilings and big doors installed.

Eventually, her growth stopped. To guess how big she was, she looked at the ceiling, which was 20 feet high. It looked there was a 10 foot gap, so she guessed she was 10 feet. She then looked down at herself. All she could see were her breasts, which were the size of beanbag chairs now. She could feel she was a ball now, her arms and legs sucked into her body, leaving only her hands and feet. In short, she was a blueberry now. She was amazed that her suit had remained intact, but again, she contributed that to the chemicals.

Wanting her assistant, Natasha began rocking back and forth, hoping to roll enough so her hand could reach her desk. Eventually, she managed it and, with great effort, hit the call button on her intercom.

"Scarlett, could you come in here? I need you for something." Natasha said into the intercom.

"Yes madam." Scarlett replied.

Natasha smiled at being called madam. Scarlett had only worked here for a few months, but she was completely devoted to Natasha. She did find it odd how Scarlett was obsessed with her even before she started working for her, but Natasha didn't care. As long as Scarlett contiuned to lavish attention on her.

Natasha heard the doors open and, with more effort, rocked herself forward to face Scarlett. Scarlett was a red Cobra gorgon, just an inch shorter then Natasha with orange eyes. She was slim up top, but had a huge butt. Natasha never did figure out why.

"Madam, what happened?" Scarlett asked.

"Cary had an accident that made her popular, so I recreated it to get that attention back." Natasha explained.

"Well, those people out there will be noticing you. Though it's hard not to. You are the most beautiful woman ever, and this just makes you even more beautiful."

That was Scarlett. Always lavishing praise onto Natasha.

"Thank you Scarlett." Natasha replied. "Now, do you mind rolling me to where Cary is?"

"It would be an honor, Madam."
---------------------------------------------------
Meanwhile, out in the parking lot, Cary had managed to learn how to roll herself and was leaving for the day. Though she found it hard to manuver with everyone around her.
