"Um, do you mind leaving? I need to get home." She said. No one listened to her.

However, everyone stopped when they heard the sound of something big being rolled. Turning, they saw the massive blue ball that was their boss, Natasha.
"Hello everyone." Natasha called out. "I know you all have come to love Cary and her blue form. But look at me. I'm bigger then her, and I make this look so much better. So, why don't you forget about that marble?"

What's this crowds reaction?
15533112.title: 10 Feet of Blue Gorgon

choices: I want more! Give me more!
155332.content: Jessica and Heidi - Jessica is a bull snake gorgon who's hiding a secret: she has a split personality named Heidi. While Jessica is shy and introverted, Heidi is outgoing and flirty. This would be bad enough, except there is one odd thing about Heidi: whenever she takes over, Jessica's body turns into a giant blueberry. Jessica only goes back to normal when she gets her body back. Stranger still, she never gets juiced when she takes over, the juice just vanishes, only to return when Heidi takes over.
155332.title: Any more?

1553322.content: Gādianburūberī - Pamela is a Copperhead Gorgon and major Anime/Manga fan. She loves them so much that she actually managed to train herself and become a proper ninja. In her possession is a ninja scroll with an interesting power: with it's technique, Pamela can inflate herself into a giant blueberry woman. Taking the name Gādianburūberī (Guardian Blueberry), she uses her inflating power to defend her city. But sometimes, she loses control of her power and gets stuck as a blueberry.
1553322.title: I want more! Give me more!

info.brief_description: This site needs more Gorgon stories. Originally made by The 12th Doctor (Non-Canon).
info.description:
Originally made and owned by The Twelfth Doctor (Non Canon).

Under new management. Received from lwut: http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/lwut2929

Gorgons are my personal favorite monster species, but there don't seem to be any gorgon stories on this lovely site of ours. So why don't we add more, starting with this one. There's going to be a few rules though.

1. This story will only have 5 expansions: Breast, Butt, Belly, Brain(think Gravitina from Buzz Lightyear), and Blueberry. Any other expansions will not be accepted.
1A. Once you pick an expansion, you cannot use any others. For example, if you pick Breast expansion, you cannot have Butt expansion. That will confuse the story.

2. No sexual content. I want to keep this clean and sane.

3. No characters under 18.

4. No bodily fluids.

5. Nothing involving feet, tickling, farting, diapers, ect.

6. Characters can be topless, but panties stay on at all times.

7. No male expansion or viewpoints.

8. No TF or TG

9. Only two character can expand at a time.

10. No vore.

11. No shrinking. That is the literal opposite of expansion.

12. If you're characters breast fill with milk, she cannot lactate.

13. No death.

14. If you choose blueberry, the character cannot pop or be juiced. That would defeat the purpose of blueberry expansion.

15. No pregnancy.

16. I know people love this, but no weight gain. (By this, I mean the fat HAS to stay in the area you picked to expand. If any other area starts growing as well, the chapter will be deleted.)

17. Whether or not they have their stone gaze is up to you. How they can control it and if they need glasses to stop it is up to you.

18. The Gorgons have to look at least 50% snake. I'm sick of Gorgons who are completely human looking except for snake hair.

19. Please don't focus on only one expansion or story. Try to broaden your horizon and add to the others. For example, if your adding to breast expansion, try to write a story in the belly expansion section. You may be surprised at what you come up with.

20. Finally, while this is an expansion story, try to actually have a plot, good grammar, and spelling. The writing minimum for this is two paragraphs. Except for option chapters.

That's all. Have fun.
